    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:28.600
    | text      = I mean, it was just a nightmare.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:31.600
    | text      = So why did you start working for him then, if that was that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:34.600
    | text      = Well, money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:36.600
    | text      = Money?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:37.600
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:38.600
    | text      = I went to the Stevens, and they said, what do you think?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:41.600
    | text      = I said, well, I've got a little check in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:45.600
    | text      = I met him, and, uh, I've got to be honest with you guys, this guy's a pathological liar.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:53.600
    | text      = I said in the hour or so that we met, I don't think he told me the truth about a damn thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:59.600
    | text      = He's a helpless womanizer. I mean, this guy's obsessed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:04.600
    | text      = And, uh, in case y'all don't know, which I was telling then, in case y'all don't know, this guy's into marijuana and probably cocaine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:13.600
    | text      = I've spent my life doing marijuana.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:16.600
    | text      = Yeah, so are we. We're cool with that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:18.600
    | text      = Hey, but then you couldn't be. Not in the deep south.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:22.600
    | text      = Not in the mid-70s, in the deep south. That was not cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:26.600
    | text      = I could see how that would be a problem with, like, the political world and stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:30.600
    | text      = But, um, Larry, this was during the. Sorry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:34.600
    | text      = So, you think you can handle the case or something like that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:39.600
    | text      = And I said I did not say I couldn't get him elected. I just told you what he was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:45.600
    | text      = So did you function as his campaign manager then?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:48.600
    | text      = We called it handler.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:50.600
    | text      = And this was during the first time he was governor of Arkansas.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:53.600
    | text      = First time, yes sir.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:54.600
    | text      = So then he did not become governor contiguously. He lost the second time and then became governor again in 83?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:05.600
    | text      = Well, we actually did. We got him elected. And then Bill got too big for his britches.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:14.600
    | text      = In 81?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:15.600
    | text      = Yes, or whatever year that was, his first term. During his first term, he just went wild.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:24.600
    | text      = He went crazy and then he made the ultimate mistake dealing with the boat people from Vietnam.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:30.600
    | text      = And he went against the Stevens's.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:34.600
    | text      = And when he did, Mr. Jack and Mr. Wick called me in and they said, you know, excuse my language,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:40.600
    | text      = they said, son of a bitch, don't listen to him. Stop breaking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:45.600
    | text      = And we're going to run somebody against him. And I said, well, who's that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:50.600
    | text      = And they said, Frank White. Now, Frank White was a Republican.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:54.600
    | text      = And in that day in Arkansas, he was the whole Republican party.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:59.600
    | text      = There were no Republicans in Arkansas. And he was a buffoon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.600
    | text      = A complete blithering idiot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:06.600
    | text      = Who are the boat people from Vietnam?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:09.600
    | text      = That was when there were all these Vietnamese that had escaped Vietnam when we pulled out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:22.600
    | text      = And they were trying to find places for them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:26.600
    | text      = We had a place called Fort Cathy in Fort Smith, Arkansas, which was an old World War II base or Army post.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.600
    | text      = And so Bill had to bring an idea that he could put them there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:40.600
    | text      = Mr. Stevens and Jack and Wick, they didn't want them in this state by any means.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:47.600
    | text      = And Bill said to hell with it. And he put them in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:50.600
    | text      = And so I went to work for Frank White and we beat Bill.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:55.600
    | text      = OK, so you went to work for Bill, then you went to work for Frank White and then you went back to work for Bill?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:04.600
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:06.600
    | text      = Why did you do that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:07.600
    | text      = Well, remember, you say I worked for Bill. Actually, I worked for the Stevens brothers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:13.600
    | text      = OK.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:14.600
    | text      = The Stevens brothers told me who and what to do. So they said, beat him. Here's our candidate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:20.600
    | text      = So we ran in, beat Bill. During that two years, Bill made up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:26.600
    | text      = And that's when Bill changed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:29.600
    | text      = That's when Bill Clinton changed. It was during that period of time, remember?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:35.600
    | text      = Well, let me say this. When we first took him on, his whole first turn, Hillary would not take his name.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:44.600
    | text      = They were married because she would not let anybody call her Hillary Clinton.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:48.600
    | text      = She would not take his name. That was a problem back then.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:54.600
    | text      = So when he came back to the Stevens, got on his hands and knees, apologized, they took him back.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:03.600
    | text      = Everything changed. He became a company man then.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:08.600
    | text      = Then he sort of straightened up and flew right. Hillary went by the name of Hillary Clinton, although she hated it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:18.600
    | text      = And we got him elected again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:20.600
    | text      = So Bill sold out basically in 82.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:22.600
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:24.600
    | text      = Okay, so then you stopped working for Bill in 1988. Why did that happen?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:31.600
    | text      = When you were working in the marketing department of the Arkansas Finance Development Authority.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:36.600
    | text      = Right. Well, I got there and I got involved with the Nicaraguan Resistance to Congress.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:45.600
    | text      = And I was running around down there doing stupid stuff and finally it got so bad down there that I was getting old,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:56.600
    | text      = couldn't run, jump, leaked tall villains in a single bound.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:00.600
    | text      = So when I got back from one of the adventures, my family instructed me I was getting too old for that racket and I needed to get a straight job.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:13.600
    | text      = What racket?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:17.600
    | text      = Working with the Contras and kind of in the jungle and doing crazy stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:23.600
    | text      = So did you actually go to Vietnam doing crazy stuff in the jungle?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:28.600
    | text      = Not Vietnam. This was in Nicaragua.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:30.600
    | text      = Sorry, Nicaragua. Sorry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:32.600
    | text      = Yes, I did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:33.600
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:34.600
    | text      = Sure did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:35.600
    | text      = Could you tell us a little bit of that crazy stuff?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:38.600
    | text      = Well, basically from getting there until you leave crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:45.600
    | text      = I would get on a plane in either New Orleans, well usually New Orleans or Florida, Miami,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:53.600
    | text      = and in Miami I'd be with a group called Southern Air.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:56.600
    | text      = They would take me in and I would jump out of the plane and then if you went out in New Orleans, you went out flying tigers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:06.600
    | text      = And we would go in and we would deliver hard and soft rice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:11.600
    | text      = Now, those are the code words for hard rice was weapons, ammunition, et cetera.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:18.600
    | text      = The soft rice was humanitarian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:22.600
    | text      = And how I got involved, if you remember, I ran Contra.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:26.600
    | text      = When Oliver North and Poindexter got KO'd in the Iran country hearings, then Reagan put me on the ground in Nicaragua replacing North
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:40.600
    | text      = and he put General Jackson up replacing Poindexter going around the country raising independent private monies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:48.600
    | text      = So how did Reagan put you down in Nicaragua?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:51.600
    | text      = You didn't stop working for Bill until 1988.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:55.600
    | text      = No, I was still with Bill.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:58.600
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:59.600
    | text      = Look, you're just a teeny-wise, what I call teeny-wise.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:05.600
    | text      = And part of what I did with my jingle company, you had to have a business where you could be gone for a few weeks if necessary at a time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:17.600
    | text      = And nobody knew any wiser.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:20.600
    | text      = So my jingle business was perfect.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:23.600
    | text      = I was going to Dallas or New York or whatever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:27.600
    | text      = And in fact, I would bust down to Nicaragua and help Enrique and the boys figure out what to do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:35.600
    | text      = And then I would make sure that the hard rice or soft rice went to where it was supposed to go.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:44.600
    | text      = Okay, so if I understand this correctly, you had a jingle business and then directly from there you were recruited into extrajudicial Nicaraguan operations?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:58.600
    | text      = Yes, pretty much.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:00.600
    | text      = That's wild.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:01.600
    | text      = How in God's name did that happen?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:05.599
    | text      = Did the Stevens brothers have something to do with that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:09.599
    | text      = Very much.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:11.599
    | text      = Stevens brothers, they had oil and gas properties in Nicaragua.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:17.599
    | text      = They were very heavily invested in Nicaragua.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:20.599
    | text      = And they needed one of their guys to take care and make sure of their investments in properties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:27.599
    | text      = And of course, you've got to understand, Mr. Whit Stevens was a big to-do prop of the group with the Democratic National Party and committee.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:40.599
    | text      = Jack Stevens was the big guy with the top of the people in the Republican national community.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:49.599
    | text      = Okay, so here's the problem I have with that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:53.599
    | text      = Their interests make sense or whatever. That's fine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:57.599
    | text      = But the idea that they would have you taking care of all of their interests based on a slight bit of advertising work seems very strange.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:06.599
    | text      = Yeah, that's like if Obama had the guys from the Sonic commercials go run Iran for a while.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:16.599
    | text      = It just seems very wild.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:20.599
    | text      = It had to have been there. Actually, it was awfully wild. It was just a job.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:28.599
    | text      = It was just a job. All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:31.599
    | text      = All right. Well, so because of that...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:36.599
    | text      = Working as a handler for Bill, I didn't stay with him 24-7.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:42.599
    | text      = Once he got elected, I would be called in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:47.599
    | text      = They needed a decision made and they wanted me to go and get him convinced to do this, that, or the other, or to stop him from doing this, that, or the other.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:57.599
    | text      = That's the way it started. The way it ended up was I ended up fixing it up with women and covering up for the women he was with and trying to keep his running around in cocaine and everything else to make sure that didn't hit the press.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:15.599
    | text      = All right. That sounds a little bit far-fetched.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:19.599
    | text      = Man, I don't know why.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:21.599
    | text      = I mean, okay. All right. I mean, that's bananas.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:30.599
    | text      = If true, that is one of the most implausible realities I think I can imagine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:38.599
    | text      = Damn, you got limited imagination.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:40.599
    | text      = Fair enough. Fair enough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:42.599
    | text      = So the public version and all the information that sort of is verifiable through sourced reports were that you worked there at the Arkansas Financial Development Authority and that you made a bunch of long-distance calls to Nicaragua and that's why Bill asked you to resign.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:02.599
    | text      = So that part is, that's true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:12.599
    | text      = How is it that all of this reporting corroborates one side of the story and only you is supporting your side?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:22.599
    | text      = You know, if you look at the media today, do you see the bias, say, for Fox News?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:34.599
    | text      = Fox News, there is nothing good the Democrats do. Nothing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:41.599
    | text      = But now if you watch ABC, NBC, CBHC in the end, MSNBC, there's nothing good the Republicans do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:49.599
    | text      = You've got to take everything. Yeah, of course. We're all adults. You've got to take everything with a grain of salt, certainly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:56.599
    | text      = But in Arkansas, remember, that's the only world I had to deal with, Arkansas and Nicaragua.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:04.599
    | text      = Well, yeah, but the Stevens, I'm talking about as far as Bill is concerned, the Stevens brothers controlled everything in Arkansas.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:15.599
    | text      = So if the Arkansas Democrat were about to break a story where they caught Bill Clinton screwing the farmer's daughter,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:25.599
    | text      = the Stevens would send me in and I would say to the Democrat, I don't think you ought to do that,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:32.599
    | text      = because if you do, we're going to pull five car dealers and six banks advertising and you're going to be in trouble.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:43.599
    | text      = And so the owners of the paper, even though the journalists might get upset, the owners could cost just about anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:51.599
    | text      = And that's what we did for years. They just controlled the media.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:55.599
    | text      = What you see today in Washington was in a smaller way, Arkansas. Arkansas was its own little third great country back then.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:03.599
    | text      = OK, so then let me ask you this question. In 2013, you went on a radio show and claimed you killed people for the Clintons.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:14.599
    | text      = Was that you were drugged up? So, yeah, I don't hear me on this because I've tried to straighten this out a minute times. I had gone and had eye surgery. I had just come in. They had used a drug on me called Verset.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:33.599
    | text      = And when I got home, the phone rang. My wife left, she went back to work. I sat down, the phone rang, a lady came on and what was his name?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:44.599
    | text      = Pete St. Tilly. I had done his show a couple of times. She said, Pete wants you on the air. And I said, I don't think I should.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:51.599
    | text      = And I told her I had just had surgery and pretty drugged up. Next thing I know, here's Pete, we're talking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:57.599
    | text      = I think we're off the air. He didn't do what you did. Say, you know, you're alive. But it wouldn't have mattered.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:05.599
    | text      = What I was trying to explain to Pete was we had a program called Kill Em When They're Young.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:13.599
    | text      = Kill Em When They're Young. That was a play we used, which meant if somebody, for example, if Bill screwed the farmer's daughter and the farmer was fixing to start blabbing,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:26.599
    | text      = we would go in, I would go in, or Morris or the guy or somebody would go in and we'd explain to the guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:33.599
    | text      = And if he looked like he was really fixing to talk, we would destroy him. You know, we'd find out about him, who he was screwing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:45.599
    | text      = So the killing was metaphorical.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:47.599
    | text      = His farm payments, whatever we could find out. And if we didn't find anything, we made it up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:53.599
    | text      = Interesting. Interesting. Interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:56.599
    | text      = If you're admitting to saying that you made stuff up then, I mean, that kind of makes it hard to believe what you're saying now, right? Do you see the...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:06.599
    | text      = Jordan, let me tell you something, and then this is what's going to kill you. I really don't care what you believe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:12.599
    | text      = That's fair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:13.599
    | text      = I truly believe that, yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:17.599
    | text      = I barely, I barely care what I believe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:19.599
    | text      = I don't come on this program claiming to be anything other than the sorriest scum of the earth you have ever known.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:31.599
    | text      = That's fair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:32.599
    | text      = There's nothing I haven't done.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:33.599
    | text      = Larry, we're not trying to come down on you. We're not, we're not...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:36.599
    | text      = Listen, hear me out. I did. I have.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:40.599
    | text      = So, there's nothing, you know, that's one of the things that the national media had trouble with when I was fighting Bill.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:49.599
    | text      = When he was president, they'd come in and they'd come in and they'd heard something and I'd say to the media,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:54.599
    | text      = hell, you think that's bad? You should have come to me. I'll tell you stuff I've done that's a lot worse.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:58.599
    | text      = Okay, well then, in that case, so if you admit to having made up stuff whenever there wasn't any information,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:07.599
    | text      = would you say that when you said that Barack Obama is a secret Muslim, you made that up to smear his name?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:16.599
    | text      = No. I said that's what I did. That's what I did, guys.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:23.599
    | text      = Okay, so when did you stop doing that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:27.599
    | text      = January the 16th, 1989.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:31.599
    | text      = When your family told you that you were getting too old?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:34.599
    | text      = No, this is after I had, you didn't ask me the trick question, what happened between Bill Clinton and I?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:42.599
    | text      = When I was in Nicaragua, Adolfo Calero, who was the head of the directory, you can check it out,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:48.599
    | text      = he kept hearing this, drugs for guns. They didn't have drugs for guns.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:55.599
    | text      = If we'd have had drugs, cocaine, we would have given it to the war wounded. We had nothing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:01.599
    | text      = He asked me if I could come back to the stage and find out what on earth, where was this coming from.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:08.599
    | text      = I came back, I was working at the Arkansas Development Finance Authority, I was marketing director.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:14.599
    | text      = Then the tight man I was with Bill that had two sets of books, which was not uncommon,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:21.599
    | text      = it was a quasi-state agency. When it needed the cover and protection of being a state agency, it was a state agency.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:29.599
    | text      = When it came time to shield money and hide money and give Bill's buddies loans, it was a private corporation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:38.599
    | text      = When I was going through the books, I kept noticing that last year Bill Clinton's best friend,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:45.599
    | text      = the guy that every day got one or two o'clock, he'd go over to his office, and last year had a huge candy dish
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:53.599
    | text      = full of this white powder. It was cocaine, had it on his desk for everybody to see.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:59.599
    | text      = That sounds crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:01.599
    | text      = Well, it's also, I mean, Larry, all this stuff is great, and I don't doubt, I mean, I might.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:07.599
    | text      = Well, what I'm trying to tell you is when I started looking in, what I found was that there was this damn airstrip
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:16.599
    | text      = in Mena, Arkansas, and it was bringing in $100 million a month of cocaine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:27.599
    | text      = From where I'm sitting, Larry, it just seems very convenient that you're bringing that into all this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:33.599
    | text      = when you admit that you were involved in Nicaragua. You know, it seems like you're maybe-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:39.599
    | text      = Well, once again, bud, I can't help you. I'll just tell you what I tell you. Can you believe it or don't? Hey,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:46.599
    | text      = no skin on my back either way. I'll tell you this, I did find it. It was in the books at the agency I worked.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:54.599
    | text      = Dan Lassiter was hiding and laundering the money through straw sales through his bond, bonding agency,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:03.599
    | text      = getting bonds from Aetna, and that was how they were running the money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:09.599
    | text      = Right. Now, here's my question to you real quick before you keep going any further.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:15.599
    | text      = Now, when you are describing this story, this is happening at the same time that you are convicted of fraud,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:23.599
    | text      = and you had to declare bankruptcy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:25.599
    | text      = Where did you get fraud out of that one?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:27.599
    | text      = It was theft by deception. They were facing charges all around Arkansas and-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:34.599
    | text      = Now, that was when I came out against Bill and they started doing the Clinton roast to me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:40.599
    | text      = That was before that. This was in the lead up to when you were a-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:44.599
    | text      = You're talking about another Larry Nichols. That was not me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:47.599
    | text      = Oh, we're talking about you, buddy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:49.599
    | text      = Be that as it may-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:00.599
    | text      = So now you're describing Bill Clinton as some sort of all-knowing power that can just black people at will.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:08.599
    | text      = Don't you see how this kind of massive conspiracy just doesn't hold up?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:14.599
    | text      = Well, especially because you're also saying that it's these banking brothers-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:18.599
    | text      = Because you don't understand the world we lived in then.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:24.599
    | text      = Jordan, then, you don't have to believe any of this. That's fine with me. That's fine. I lived it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:33.599
    | text      = Okay. Well then-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:34.599
    | text      = Let me tell you about the stuff I lived hot nuts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:37.599
    | text      = Okay. All right. Well then, let's switch gears then.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:41.599
    | text      = So, just recently, in 2015, you told Alex Jones that Obama wanted to be the last president because if you're the last president, you become king.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:55.599
    | text      = That's right. Under the FEMA provisional government system, yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:59.599
    | text      = Why do you think that's true?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:02.599
    | text      = Because I spent two years working with General Tommy Franks. We worked on the FEMA provisional committee.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:12.599
    | text      = And the FEMA provisional government is what everybody in Washington, I don't know who you know with anybody,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:21.599
    | text      = but anybody that's been around Washington for the past 25, 30 years knows that for years and years and years,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:32.599
    | text      = the whole thing comes down to if this country goes into a state of disarray,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:41.599
    | text      = then all of a sudden there are two things that can happen that trigger with the president only for putting us into FEMA provisional government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:53.599
    | text      = One, of course, is some kind of attack or national disaster.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:01.599
    | text      = The other is if five major cities have five major riots at one time, the president can push a button and declare FEMA provisional government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:18.599
    | text      = That's demonstrably untrue.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:21.599
    | text      = See you here again, Jordan. I just killed him. Where do you live?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:26.599
    | text      = I mean, I don't know. I don't know who's watching. Yeah, I live in Chicago.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:32.599
    | text      = How many years have you spent in Washington?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:34.599
    | text      = I have spent no years in Washington.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:36.599
    | text      = Oh, wait a minute. Then how many years have you spent with governors and United States congressmen? How many years have you done that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:46.599
    | text      = I have done none of that either.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:50.599
    | text      = I've read a lot of these FEMA documents. I've read a lot of those.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:55.599
    | text      = All of those FEMA documents, though, are public information.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:59.599
    | text      = So you're saying that there's a secret set of FEMA documents that we don't know about?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:03.599
    | text      = I'm saying that the FEMA provisional government triggering plan is as real as the chair you're sitting in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:14.599
    | text      = It's just that real, bud.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:16.599
    | text      = Now, there's a lot of things. This just kills me. This one kills me, Jordan, man. And I love you guys. This is fun.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:25.599
    | text      = What gets me is there are people that run around and they say they know this, that and the other.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:31.599
    | text      = Washington is a city full of secrets.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:36.599
    | text      = Our government is a government full of secrets. And if you, say in Chicago, can go on the internet or wherever it is you go,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:49.599
    | text      = and you can just trip through and find out all of the secrets, then it really wouldn't be a secret, would it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:57.599
    | text      = Does that make sense to you?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:59.599
    | text      = I think we're just basing this on things we've read, things that we understand.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:04.599
    | text      = And the idea that the president becomes king and all the congresspeople become dukes, it's just very fanciful.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:12.599
    | text      = That's not how the world works.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:15.599
    | text      = Let me ask you this. How much does a congressman now make a year?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:21.599
    | text      = Roughly $250,000.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:24.599
    | text      = $250,000. Does it make sense to you that somebody would spend 20, 30 million to get that job?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:33.599
    | text      = Well, yeah, all they want is tax cuts for the rich.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:37.599
    | text      = They want the powers, what you're saying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:39.599
    | text      = Well, and sneaky money that's not in their salary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:43.599
    | text      = And then you consider all of the parachutes that they're taking on consulting and lobbying jobs later on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:48.599
    | text      = It's not becoming a duke.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:50.599
    | text      = It's not some sort of feudal society that they're trying to build.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:55.599
    | text      = But you see, all of that is muddied up into a whole world that I'm trying to tell people about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:04.599
    | text      = And I know, Justin, Dan, I know, buddy, when you stand flat-footed, you look at another normal human being,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:13.599
    | text      = and you tell them about the FEMA provisional government system and plan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:18.599
    | text      = You don't think I haven't seen eyes roll back in the back of the head.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:22.599
    | text      = I bet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:23.599
    | text      = You don't think, I don't think they know I'm a nut.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:27.599
    | text      = That's a good point. I think everybody's pretty aware.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:32.599
    | text      = Yeah. It's not easy, guys. It's not easy telling what has to be told.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:39.599
    | text      = What I think has to be told. Now, I can be wrong.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:42.599
    | text      = And I'll tell you this. It cost me and my family everything to do this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:50.599
    | text      = And when I was with Bill and the Stevens brothers, hey, buddy, it was a sad city.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:55.599
    | text      = Sad city.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:57.599
    | text      = Well, then if we're going to talk about the cost of things, would you say that right now part of your income,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:06.599
    | text      = if not a lot of it, comes down to, you know, people believing what you're saying?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:15.599
    | text      = It comes down to me telling people what I believe, what I know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:23.599
    | text      = That's it. That's it, man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:26.599
    | text      = Also, what do you got? You got people that buy ads for your program or you've got people that contribute to your program?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:34.599
    | text      = No, we have jobs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:35.599
    | text      = They believe you, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:37.599
    | text      = We have nine to five jobs and a couple of jack offs who think we're funny.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:43.599
    | text      = That's what we got, Larry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:45.599
    | text      = That's all right. But there are people. What I'm saying is there are people that listen to you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:51.599
    | text      = The people that listen to you. And you may be right. You may not be, but they believe in you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:57.599
    | text      = All I can do, guys, all I can do, Jordan, is tell what I know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:02.599
    | text      = And when I tell it, you know what? I'm clean.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:05.599
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:07.599
    | text      = Well, then here's my question.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:11.599
    | text      = If you are afraid of Obama trying to become the last president and then becoming king, essentially, are you not worried about Trump doing that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:25.599
    | text      = OK, so would you say that Trump is if Trump.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:28.599
    | text      = So here's here's the thing I want to know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:31.599
    | text      = Knowing what we know about Trump and his actions currently, it seems far more likely that Trump is going to try and pull that off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:39.599
    | text      = It is. If it is real, then Obama ever would.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:42.599
    | text      = Right, because he's not a secret.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:44.599
    | text      = It is within his power to do it. Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:47.599
    | text      = And oh, this is fun.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:49.599
    | text      = But then again, it's within his power as it was Obama, as it would have been in the Middle East.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:55.599
    | text      = You know, if you push the button, it's within his power.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:00.599
    | text      = If becoming king is part of the FEMA provisional powers, it stands to reason that FEMA, as it is right now after these hurricanes, we've seen that they don't do the best job necessarily.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:13.599
    | text      = They are not necessarily the most effective organization that we have within our government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:18.599
    | text      = It seems like them installing a kingship might be difficult when they can't get supplies where they need to be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:27.599
    | text      = And then you'd need the support of the military.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:30.599
